column2: As a Sales Team Member for Commercial and Industrial Solar Solutions, you will play a pivotal role in driving the growth and success of Reliance Distributed RE by developing and nurturing relationships with key clients in the commercial and industrial sectors. You will be responsible for generating new business opportunities, managing existing accounts, ensuring regulatory compliance, and liaising with stakeholders to deliver tailored solar energy solutions. Additionally, you will collaborate with internal teams to provide technical expertise, support the bidding process, and facilitate power purchase agreements (PPAs) for open access customers. Key Responsibilities: 1.  Account Management : Develop and maintain strong, long-lasting relationships with key clients in the commercial and industrial sectors. Serve as the primary point of contact for client inquiries, issues, and escalations, ensuring timely resolution and high levels of customer satisfaction. Conduct regular business reviews with clients to understand their evolving needs and identify opportunities for additional solutions and services. 2.   Business Development: Identify and pursue new business opportunities within the commercial and industrial segments, leveraging industry knowledge and market insights. Collaborate with the sales and marketing teams to develop targeted strategies and campaigns to attract new clients and expand market reach. 3.   Solutioning and Consultation: Work closely with clients to understand their energy requirements, assess their site feasibility, and design customized solar power solutions that align with their objectives and budget. Collaborate with the engineering and technology teams to develop innovative solutions and incorporate cutting-edge technologies to optimize system performance and efficiency. Provide expert consultation and guidance to clients on the benefits of solar energy, including cost savings, sustainability, and environmental impact. 4.   Regulatory Knowledge and Liaison: Stay informed about regulatory requirements, policies, and incentives related to solar energy in the commercial and industrial sectors. 5.   Knowledge of both Open Access and Captive: Assist clients in understanding the benefits and implications of power purchase agreements (PPAs) for open access customers. Collaborate with legal and finance teams to structure and negotiate PPAs that align with clients' financial and operational requirements. Facilitate the implementation of PPAs, including contract execution, metering arrangements, and ongoing monitoring and reporting. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Engineering, Renewable Energy, or related field (Master's degree preferred). Experience ranging from 5-15 years in Technical Solution Sales Proven track record of success in sales, business development, or account management roles. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively engage and influence key stakeholders at all levels. Highly organized with strong project management capabilities, able to prioritize tasks, meet deadlines, and multitask in a fast-paced environment.

Education Qualification : Any Degree  Job Description Responsible for Business Development / Sales / Opening new accounts for achieving assigned Services business targets for the territory / accounts / vertical. Forecasting and achieving monthly/quarterly business targets by offering IT services to enterprise customer Soliciting business for IT Infrastructure Managed Services, Data Centre Management Services, Cloud Management Services, End User Management Services, Network Management Services, Remote Infrastructure Management Services, NOC & SOC Services, Security Device Management Services, Identity& Access Management Services, Cloud & Hosting Services, Annual Maintenance Contracts (AMC / Device Uptime Services), Facility Management Services (FMS), Tools and Services Automation Solution and Professional Services. column2: Masters India IT Solutions is a growing FinTech SaaS firm, serving over 1500+ enterprises. Masters India is one of the biggest GST Suvidha Providers (GSP) appointed by the Goods and Services Tax Network (GSTN) of Government of India since 2017. Our mission is to build intuitive software solutions for complex problems faced by businesses across the industries. We are fulfilling our mission by offering tax and financial automation products to enterprises. Masters India IT Solutions is a part of 44 year old Masters India group which is into Manufacturing, Healthcare, Hospitality and IT with an aggregate turnover of INR 1000+ Crores. Looking for a self-motivated and highly driven Business Manager. Must have excellent interpersonal skills with a drive to make new relationships. The candidate should have a good understanding of the SaaS industry and also relevant knowledge of Software Solutions and preferably 3 - 5 years of Software sales experience. Job role requirement: Graduate / Postgraduate from Management and Engineering (Computers / IT) background. Strong sales and Account management skills. Ability to make formal and informal presentations to clients. Strong communication skills and IT fluency. Ability to flourish with minimal guidance, be proactive and handle uncertainty. Go getter with strong self-drive. Ability to prioritize work assignments and shift work efforts based on the needs of the department or business goals. Ability to manage time effectively, work independently and be self-motivated. Must be willing to travel across the country, whenever required. Articulate the value proposition and competitive positioning for all the products that one will be responsible to sell. Anticipate and handle objections during the sales process articulating clear and concise responses that position the benefits of the platform. Increasing the revenue from existing customers while attracting new ones by way of client acquisition and penetration. Ensuring daily/week updates of pipeline & provide accurate forecasts to the sales leadership team on an ongoing basis. You will engage with the top-level executives in the industry to generate sales through product presentation/demos and effectively communicate the products value proposition. This position will have a direct impact on our success by providing qualifying prospects from lead status into the sales pipeline. This role will handle all first contact with new clients and build relationships through marketing activity  events, campaigns, direct mail, email, etc. Use of strong selling and influencing skills to set up qualified appointments. Consistent use of sales approach and techniques based on product or service solutions. Log, track and maintain customer contact and contact records. Attend sales meetings, vendor training, local trade shows to keep current with technology. Providing management with feedback. column2: Smart infrastructure from Siemens makes the world a more connected and caring place where resources are valued, where impact on the world is considered, where sustainable energy is delivered reliably and efficiently. It provides the flexible infrastructure to allow society to evolve and respond to changing conditions. Technology and the ingenuity of people come together to be at one with our environments and to care for our world. We do this from the macro to the micro level, from physical products, components and systems to connected, cloud-based digital offerings and services. Siemens offers a broad portfolio of grid control and automation; low- and medium- voltage power distribution, switching and control; and building automation, fire safety and security, HVAC control and energy solutions. Join us! We Make Real What Matters. This Is Your Role. We don't need superheroes, just super minds! Major Responsibilities : The Sales Manager is essentially responsible for correct implementation of the sales and marketing strategy in VAP RSL channel partner defined by the business unit with a view to attaining a defined sales target with accurate forecast. To support in implementing effective Solution partner and Distribution partner program in the region To establish, maintain and improve on meeting the needs of the VAP/RSL Channel and End customers in the region and support for all techno commercial needs. To achieve the assigned yearly Sales targets (e.g. Order intake & Sales revenue) with a say to Do ratio of 95% month on month. Maintain and track the Sales funnel, to win projects and specification activities with identified consultants and create an advantageous situation for the projects in the Region with channel partners. Achieve timely invoicing of Sales orders booked with reference to the lead time of the product and achieve the forecasted sales revenue target month on month. Achieve timely collection as per the collectable outstanding for the month with Channels/Customers and achieve the forecasted monthly collection target month on month. Make scheduled monthly visits to Key consultants and closely work on Specifying Siemens products & system portfolio from the presales stages to create the pull for the portfolio. Support development of new channel partners in the Region and provide presales and Design support during initial stages to make them familiarize with CPS Comfort Portfolio. Product Knowledge : Any product mentioned below. Knowledge of selling including Building management system, HVAC Products, Application Know How on HVAC Solutions and capability to propose customized solutions. Product Proficiency Required: PICV, Ball valve, Butterfly valve, Stroke valve, Damper Actuator, Thermostat, Sensors, Field Devices.

Conduct thorough keyword research and analysis to identify?opportunities for improving search rankings and organic traffic.  On-Page Optimization:   Optimize website content, meta tags, and other on-page elements to improve search engine rankings and enhance user experience.  Implement SEO best practices, including proper URL structures, internal linking, and user-friendly navigation.  Technical SEO:   Identify?and address technical SEO issues that may hinder search engine crawling and indexing of the website.  Monitor and optimize?website speed, mobile-friendliness, and other technical aspects affecting SEO performance.  Content Marketing and Link Building:   Collaborate with the content team to develop high-quality, SEO-friendly content that aligns with the company's SEO objectives.  Conduct outreach and link-building activities to acquire?high-quality backlinks from relevant and authoritative websites.  Performance Analysis and Reporting:   Utilize SEO tools and analytics platforms to track key performance indicators (KPIs) and provide?regular reports on SEO performance and progress.  Analyze data to identify?trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement, and use insights to refine SEO strategies.  Stay Updated on SEO Trends:   Keep abreast of industry trends, search engine algorithm updates, and best practices to ensure the company's SEO strategies remain?effective and up-to-date.  Beyond (How you will grow and what more you can do):   Take responsibility- Learn new skills, grow as a person and a professional, inculcate skills and Learnings in yourself and others.  Realize your Capabilities & Potentials- take ownership and build synergies to collaborate and help everyone around you.  Be involved, come up with?innovative ideas and take initiatives.  The skills you need to bring along-   Proven 3-5 years' experience as an SEO Specialist or similar role, with a track record?of successful SEO campaigns and improved search rankings.  In-depth knowledge of search engine algorithms, ranking factors, and SEO best practices.  Proficiency?in SEO tools such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, Moz, or similar platforms.  Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to draw insights from data and make data-driven decisions.  Excellent communication skills to collaborate with team members and stakeholders effectively.  Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and website development is a must. You are expected to independently identify, connect with, qualify, and close deals with   prospective GCCs (Global Captive Centers), large corporates, enterprise clients across top industries including banking, financial services, insurance, hospitality, CPG, retail, ecommerce, aviation, and other sectors in India requiring frequent travel. column2: ?             As an Assistant Manager - Enterprise Sales at Novopay, you will play a crucial role in driving strategic partnerships with various organizations, including banks, financial institutions, merchants, and other key stakeholders in the fintech industry. Your primary responsibility will be to identify, establish, and nurture partnerships to drive business growth and expand Novopay's reach in the market.                 Responsibilities:                 Partnership Development:                   Identify potential partners and evaluate their suitability based on Novopay's business objectives and target markets. Build and maintain a robust pipeline of partnership opportunities. Collaborate with internal teams to assess partnership feasibility, negotiate terms, and execute partnership agreements.                  Conduct market research and analysis to identify emerging trends and potential partnership opportunities.                   Relationship Management:                   Cultivate strong relationships with key partners, understanding their needs and aligning them with Novopay's offerings. Act as the main point of contact for partners, addressing their inquiries, resolving issues, and ensuring smooth collaboration.                  Coordinate cross-functional teams within Novopay to ensure effective partner onboarding, integration, and ongoing support. Monitor and track partnerperformance, identifying areas for improvement and implementing strategies to optimize partnership outcomes.                   Strategic Planning and Execution:                   Develop and execute partnership strategies to achieve business goals and revenue targets. Collaborate with internal stakeholders to align partnership objectives with product development, marketing, and sales efforts.                  Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and regulatory changes to identify potential risks and opportunities for partnerships.                   Collaboration and Communication:                   Foster a collaborative environment by working closely with internal teams, including sales, marketing, product, and legal, to ensure successful partnership outcomes.                 Communicate partnership updates, progress, and performance metrics to internal and external stakeholders.                  Represent Novopay at industry events, conferences, and networking opportunities to enhance the company's visibility and expand thepartnership network.                   Qualifications:                   Bachelor's degree in business, finance, or a related field (Master's degree preferred).                 Proven experience (2-3 years) in partnership management, business development, or sales within the fintech or financial services industry.                  Strong understanding of the fintech landscape, including payments, digital banking, and financial technologytrends.                  Demonstrated track record of successfully identifying, negotiating, and implementing partnerships that drive business growth.                  Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships at various levels.                  Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, with the capacity to navigate complex business and technical landscapes.Self-motivated, proactive, and results-oriented, with the ability to work independently and in a team environment.                  Familiarity with regulatory frameworks and compliance requirements relevant to the fintech industry.                 Willingness to travel as required for partner meetings, industry events, and conferences.                  Joining Novopay as a Partnership Manager offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to the growth of a dynamic fintech company, build strategic relationships, and drive innovation in the financial services industry.                  If you are passionate about partnerships, possess strong business acumen, and thrive in a fast-paced environment

column2: As a Sales and Marketing Executive, you will play a pivotal role in driving revenue growth and expanding our market presence. You will be responsible for developing and implementing comprehensive sales and marketing strategies to achieve company objectives and targets. Role & responsibilities: Develop and execute strategic sales plans to achieve sales targets and expand market share. Identify and cultivate new business opportunities through proactive prospecting and lead generation activities. Build and maintain strong relationships with existing clients to ensure customer satisfaction and loyalty. Conduct market research and analysis to identify emerging trends, customer needs, and competitive threats. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product development, marketing, and customer service, to align sales and marketing efforts and support overall business objectives. Create compelling sales and marketing collateral, including presentations, proposals, and promotional materials. Monitor and report on sales performance, market trends, and competitor activities to senior management. Stay abreast of industry developments and best practices to continuously improve sales and marketing effectiveness. Preferred candidate profile: Bachelor's degree in engineering (Electronics / Electrical / Power Electronics) or a related field.  Proven track record of success in sales and/or marketing roles, with a minimum of 2-8 years of experience in electronic component industry.       Strong understanding of sales and marketing principles, strategies, and techniques. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. Ability to think strategically, analyze data, and make informed business decisions. Proficiency in Microsoft Office & PPT presentations.  Self-motivated, results-oriented, and able to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. Perks and benefits: Competitive salary and performance-based incentives. Long term benefit-oriented retirement savings plan. Opportunities for professional development and career advancement. Dynamic and collaborative work environment.

column2: At TFrenzy, we are passionate about technological innovation in the data platform sphere. We recognize that no single solution can meet every data-centric requirement, so we embrace a diverse array of database technologies. Our team of experts specializes in cloud database administration, data engineering, data science, and cloud infrastructure management. We focus on crafting customized solutions that enhance operational efficiency and strategic data utilization for our clients. Job Description We are looking for a Business Development Executive at TFrenzy. This will be a permanent remote opportunity. The Business Development Executive will be responsible for daily tasks related to new business development, lead generation, business communication, and account management. The role will involve working closely with clients to understand their needs, developing business strategies, and cultivating relationships to drive growth and meet revenue targets. Qualifications New Business Development and Lead Generation skills Strong business acumen and excellent communication skills Ability to effectively manage client accounts Experience in sales or business development(2-5 years) Proven track record of achieving targets Familiarity with data platform technologies Should have worked in Staffing Projects Knowledge of basic cloud infrastructure and data management Experience in the technology industry is a plus Master's degree in Business or a related field Qualities Sales Experience : Should have at least two years of relevant sales experience, particularly in roles that involve closing deals related to Staff Augmentation. Independence : Ability to work autonomously and take initiative without constant supervision is crucial in our nascent startup environment. Discipline : Self-motivated and able to maintain focus and productivity without a structured corporate environment. Analytical Skills:  Being a scientist in terms of analyzing data, understanding market trends, and adjusting strategies accordingly. Entrepreneurial Spirit : The salesperson in our startup should have an entrepreneurial mindset, ready to take on the challenges and risks associated with every new venture. Resourcefulness : Creative in finding solutions and making the most of limited resources. Resilience : Ability to bounce back from setbacks and persisting through challenges is key in our ever-evolving startup landscape. Willingness to Take on Responsibility : Should be eager to take on a significant amount of responsibility, as they will be instrumental in building the sales process from the ground up. If you think you have "whatever it takes" attitude in you.. Come join us..

Cold call as appropriate within your market or geographic area to ensure a robust pipeline of opportunities. Meet potential clients by growing, maintaining, and leveraging your network. Identify potential clients, and the decision makers within the client organization. Research and build relationships with new clients. Work with team to develop proposals that speaks to the clients needs, concerns, and objectives. Participate in pricing the solution/service. Handle objections by clarifying, emphasizing agreements and working through differences to a positive conclusion. Use a variety of styles to persuade or negotiate appropriately. Client Retention Present new products and services and enhance existing relationships. Work with technical staff and other internal colleagues to meet customer needs. Arrange and participate in internal and external client debriefs. Business Development Planning Attend industry functions, such as association events and conferences, and provide feedback and information on market and creative trends. Present to and consult with mid and senior level management on business trends with a view to developing new services, products, and distribution channels. Identify opportunities for campaigns, services, and distribution channels that will lead to an increase in sales. Using knowledge of the market and competitors, identify and develop the companys unique selling propositions and differentiators. Management and Research Submit weekly progress reports and ensure data is accurate. Ensure that data is accurately entered and managed within the companys CRM or other sales management system. Forecast sales targets and ensure they are met by the team. Track and record activity on accounts and help to close deals to meet these targets. Work with marketing staff to ensure that prerequisites (like prequalification or getting on a vendor list) are fulfilled within a timely manner. Ensure all team members represent the company in the best light. Present business development training and mentoring to business developers and other internal staff. Research and develop a thorough understanding of the companys people and capabilities. Understand the companys goal and purpose so that will continual to enhance the companys performance. Education Business development management positions require a bachelors degree preferably Engineering. 2-5 years of sales or marketing experience. An MBA is preferred. column2: Role Title :  Account Manager   Level:  Executive  Function: Emerging Business    Location :  PAN India  Reporting to: ZSM   Skill:  B2B sales(Field work)  About Bharti Airtel   Bharti Airtel Limited  is an Indian global telecommunications services company based in New Delhi, India. It operates in 16 countries across South Asia and Africa. Airtel provides GSM, 3G, 4G LTE and VoLTE mobile services, fixed line broadband and voice services depending upon the country of operation. Airtel had also rolled out its VoLTE technology across seven telecom circles namely Mumbai, Maharashtra and Goa, Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh, Gujarat, Andhra Pradesh & Telangana, Karnataka, Tamilnadu and Kolkata in India and should roll out the technology in rest circles by end of March 2018.[6] It is the largest mobile network operator in India and the third largest in the world with over 386 million subscribers.  Purpose of the Job   The responsibility of the role holder is to ensure sales and service in his territory to deliver Data (Internet Bandwidth, MPLS, Cloud etc.), Voice (Postpaid), Broadband and Fixed Line Business in the assigned territory. Front-end the relationship with customer from Airtel side and become the single point of contact for customer for all three lines of business.  Ensure Customer Market Share (CMS) and Revenue Market Share (RMS) growth in both existing and new accounts.  Key Deliverables   Deliver Data, Voice and Fixed Line installation as per assigned targets  New account break-in (hunting) for Data, Voice and Fixed Line.  Cross-sell multi-product lines in existing and new customer  Build & maintain healthy funnel for all three Lines of Business with earmarked levels of maturity  Be aware of competition plans & collect insights for market intelligence  Monitor competitions customer offerings and planning sales interventions for different class of clients.  Role details:  Build and maintain strong, long lasting client relationships  Negotiate and close orders/contracts to maximize revenue  Develop new business through upsell and cross-sell with existing clients  Ensure timely and successful delivery of our solutions as per client needs  Minimum 1 year B2B sales experience Any Graduate Good communication Age -  Up to 30 Years Female Candidate Preferred  Should be comfortable with  Field work . Location: Ahmedabad  Interested candidates can share their resume to sweety.angiya @airtel.com Thanks and Regards, Sweety Angiya / 7358354314 Airtel HR team

column2: Immediate hiring for  Business Development Manager  for  Quikr India Pvt Ltd  with a day shift, 6 days working and Sunday is fixed off. salary up to 5 L PA + Incentives, For more details, call  Lavanya  @  9742337173  and share cv -  lavanya.d@quikr.com Quikr  is all about you - Our aim is to empower every person in the country to independently connect with buyers and sellers online. The brainchild of Pranay Chulet, Quikr is India's no. 1 online classifieds platform - and there's a reason behind that. We care about you - and the transactions that bring you closer to your dreams. Want to buy your first car? Were here for you. Want to sell commercial property to buy a home for your family? Were here for you. Whatever job youve got, we promise to get it done. Founded in 2008 and headquartered in Bangalore, Quikr has left a memorable footprint in over 1000 cities. And we continue to work towards building the future of trading and e-commerce. In 2014 we raised about $150 million split into different sources - In a financing round led by Tiger Global, we raised $90 million, and in yet another round led by Kinnevik, we raised $60 million. Till now, Quikr has raised $350 million in 7 rounds, to fulfill the dream of disrupting the Indian e-commerce market to enable and empower people. In India, the company's product offerings include 2G, 3G, 4G and now 5G wireless services, mobile commerce, fixed line services, high speed home broadband, DTH, enterprise services including national & international long-distance services to carriers. In the rest of the geographies, it offers 2G, 3G, 4G wireless services and mobile commerce. We are always looking for people who are thinkers & doers. People with passion, curiosity & conviction, people who are eager to break away from conventional roles and do  'jobs never done before'. column2: Role & responsibilities   Preferred candidate profile   General Manager / Associate General Manager-Sales (SME) About Client:  Our client, a leading insuretech startup specializes in providing innovative and comprehensive employee benefits solutions, offering a range of customizable packages tailored to meet the unique needs of businesses through their tech-first platform. They are backed by leading global investors and are on their scale up stage. Designation: General Manager / Associate General Manager-Sales Location: Bangalore Roles: Individual Contributor (to begin with) Team: SME- Market Sales About The Role We're looking for rockstar sales reps with proven experience of performance in a hunting and outbound prospecting based set up. Someone who has a very disciplined approach towards selling, managing sales pipeline and keeping CRM up to date at any given point of time and is a result driven professional. A background in B2B sales from the Insurance industry is highly preferred.. Core Responsibilities: Speaking to Company's prospective clients Understanding their unique requirements Explaining and sharpening Company's value-proposition Providing the product team with feedback to improve offerings Manage and forecast a sales pipeline on your own Present Companys Benefits to CXOs & senior executives in client meetings Communicate constantly with marketing and pre-sales to improve the quality of the sale pipeline Ensure a high level of responsiveness with prospects through the sales process Proactively source new leads and new business opportunities Job Requirement Expertise & Qualification: Apart from overall experience, at least 3 years of B2B direct sales experience in the insurance broking industry (EB products) is highly preferred. Experience of outbound prospecting, cold calling and managing sales pipeline Previous experience mainly into hunting, new clients acquisition and sales closures Experience having sold to Founders, CHROs & HR team or CFOs Finance team is a mandatory. Consistently meeting assigned sales targets Strong spoken and written communication skills in English Disciplined approach towards updating CRM Note: People who are working only on global mandates will not be a fit, we need domestic direct sales experience (specifically Indian metropolitan cities) and selling to small enterprises. Perks and benefits
column11: Insurance Broking, Corporate Insurance, B2B Corporate Sales, Enterprise Sales, Group Insurance, Group Sales, New Client Acquisition, SME Sales, Corporate Business Development, Large Account Management, Client Retention, Employee Benefit, Employee Benefits, Eb

column2: We are looking for a high-performing Enterprise Sales Manager to meet customer acquisition targets.          You will be responsible for maximizing our sales team potential, driving customer acquisition and executing the sales strategy.            Build and promote strong, long-lasting customer relationships by partnering with them      and understanding their needs.              Identifying the correct decision makers in the companies and setting up the meeting to      understand their requirements and how our products can help them.              A seasoned sales professional with an innate hunter mentality who has a proven track      record of over-achieving sales revenue growth targets              Actively approach targeted business clients (telephone, email, social networks, events,      etc.) Search for new client leads and ability to build a new sales pipeline.              Responsible for generating contacts and leads.              Maintain and expand the database of prospects.              Developing and managing relationships with CXO level              An individual with an innate sense of ownership successfully works towards closing      deals.              Negotiating with the required stakeholders and closing the deal              Maintaining the relationship with the client              Delivering growth targets across geographies, customer segments, and products            Desired Skills and Requirement:            MBA desired              Proven experience in new client acquisition.              Willing to travel meeting prospects              An attitude to get things done and willingness to work in a high-growth start-up      environment              Excellent Relationship Management skills              Excellent presentation skills.              Good communication skills
column11: Relationship management, Customer acquisition, Sales strategy, Sales, Relationship, Database, cxo, Client acquisition, Enterprise sales, Recruitment

column2: Establishing a systematic process for partner outreach and relationship management.         Building and developing commercial and strategic relationships with our key targeted partners.         Coordinating with the communications team to ensure that any information going out is in the best interest of the company.         Working with other teams internal to the partner organization to ensure that Alliance and Partnership goals are synchronized with organizational goals.         Encouraging and supervising any collaborations with partner network organizations.         Negotiating and finalizing deals with partners and alliances that benefit the company.         Attending various trade fairs and networking events on behalf of the company.         Working in liaison with the sales and marketing team to understand current market trends and build relationships accordingly.         Strategizing new ways to grow current partnerships.         Traveling to other places of business.               More about YOU             A graduation degree with 3+ years of proven experience in building partnerships.         Good Sales, communication, and Negotiation skills.         Energy, enthusiasm, and flair to work hard and achieve ambitious targets.         Self-motivated, committed with a go-getter attitude.         Proven ability to build, manage and develop multi-stakeholder relationships.         Substantial experience in project proposal writing and management.         Talent for building relationships and a proven track record in business partnerships.         Extremely passionate about the potential for impactful enterprises to drive sustainable development and improve farm productivity.         Demonstrable track record of private, semi-govt./govt. institutional partnerships.         Comfortable traveling and dealing with International and National Partners.

column2: Roles and Responsibilities:  The Business Development Manager at Community Samvada will be responsible for Selling/booking advertising space to SMEs and Corporate in Gurgaon/ Gurugram and New Delhi.  Handle Inbound calls from clients who would like to advertise with Samvada.  Make outbound calls to prospects who could use Samvada to promote their businesses.  Explain the concept of Samvada (through phone calls/virtual meetings/physical meetings) to the prospective clients and after understanding their business, propose various packages to book their advertising.  Follow ups with the clients.  Participate with DTP to design the creatives of advertisers.  Keep a connect with the clients and make sure they are satisfied with our services. Desired Candidate Profile:  The ideal candidate should have an experience in print media/insurance/hospitality or service industry. We're looking for an energetic self-starter with a consultative sales approach who is proactive in driving revenue and increasing the client base. She must be result driven and should be able to articulate the overall business objectives of Samvada and its value proposition to the advertising community. Basic Qualifications:   Any Graduate or any PG Minimum 3+ years experience in sales/business development Computer Savvy Candidate with Own Conveyance is preferred Preferred Qualifications: Excellent written and verbal communication skills Experience of working within a dynamic, performance-driven environment. Track record of managing negotiations to successful closure and delivery. Preferred Age Group: 27 to 40 years Who should be looking to join Samvada? Anyone looking at career growth Anyone who has taken a sabbatical and now wants to resume working Anyone looking at a Flexible work environment Entrepreneurs who want to switch to a stable source of income Why look at Samvada? Women oriented organization Anyone who is looking at working in a focused territory, resulting in less stress. Anyone who is looking at hands-on training and developing their skills Candidates who are looking at a variety of client categories(B2C)
column11: Marketing, Sales, Ad Sales, Ad Space Selling, Business Development, Negotiation, New Client Acquisition, Client Development, Concept Selling, Revenue Generation, client retention, Selling, consultative sales, Concept Sales, Space Selling, New Business Acquisition

column2: Having found exceptional product/market fit, we're in the midst of transitioning from start-up to scale-up , and looking for account managers to capitalize on the huge demand for our product     We are looking for passionate entrepreneurs, builders and straight up hustlers to help us build something special     we're looking for outstanding account managers who have consistently delivered high customer satisfaction, and thrive in taking full ownership of delivering delight to customers     you'll be an articulate presenter and a strategic planner but above all, dynamic and goal-oriented     We don't pretend that it ll be easy - joining a company and embarking on the scale-up phase is an amazing challenge, pushing well beyond the boundaries of natural growth cycles     you'll move quicker than feels comfortable, and be brilliant at continually re-prioritising what must get done to keep Plum growing month over month at the pace of the fastest growing SaaS companies in history           Roles and Responsibilities:         You would be the face of Plum to our large account customers     You would help employees and employers use their health insurance and health benefits in the most seamless way possible     You would develop a deep level of understanding and knowledge of the entire product , systems and processes     You would oversee insurance policy placement, uploading of health IDs, and configuring of benefits     You would devise implement engagement plan     You would execute upsell and x-sell opportunities     You would execute policy renewals     You would coordinate with insurance partners for resolution/clarifications if needed     You would drive 100% customer retention by delivering extraordinary service           At least 4-8 years of experience in B2B sales and customer facing role     Very strong written and verbal communication     High customer empathy     Strong problem solver, can hustle to unblock customers     Ability to work with cross functional teams to resolve issues     Comfortable using modern tools like Intercom, Slack, Google Suite, Hubspot     Strong adherence to SLAs and processes
column11: Health insurance, Customer satisfaction, SAAS, Customer retention, Transition, Healthcare, Account management, B2B Sales, SLAS

column2: Roles and Responsibilities: a) Building and maintaining strong, long-lasting customer relationships.   b) Educating our customers about our business solutions.   c) Cold calling, generating new leads and closing new deals as per the target assigned.   d) Day to day interaction with sellers persuading them to keep using our solutions.   e) Cooperating with internal teams and assisting customers on them on boarding and training. Skills and Qualifications:   a) Work experience in B2B product sales or in e-commerce, especially in the SMB segment in India.   b) Experience ideally in a start-up environment preferably in a SAAS based organization.   c) Previous responsibility for strategic business development, revenue targets and quotas is highly desirable.   d) Good in understanding concepts and confident in showcasing multiple demos daily.   e) Familiar with working on CRM tools.   f) Full professional proficiency of regional language will be an added advantage.   g) Ability to deal with ambiguity in a fast-paced target focused environment.   h) Experience selling SAAS/IT products/services into new markets is desirable.   i) Proficient in technology especially Microsoft Office applications.   j) Proactive qualities with willingness to learn and work with minimal supervision.   k) India and MEA/SEA region experience preferred.
column11: SaaS, It Solution Sales, B2B, New Client Acquisition, E-commerce, It Product Sales, IT Sales

column2: Having found exceptional product/market fit, we're in the midst of transitioning from start-up to scale-up      We are looking for a stellar Enterprise Sales Lead to capitalize on the huge demand for our product     We are looking for passionate entrepreneurs, builders and straight up hustlers to help us build scale     we're looking for an outstanding sales person who has consistently hit target and thrive in taking full ownership of the sales cycle, from lead generation through to closing     We are looking for someone who has successfully sold GMC to large enterprises and can hit the ground running on day one         You will           Own and deliver sales quota     Sell "Plum" to CHROs, CFOs, CEOs senior executives in customer meetings     Negotiate commercials with both customers and insurers     Generate, manage and forecast a sales pipeline on your own     Proactively source new leads           You have         At least 4 years of experience selling GMC to enterprise customers (500+ employees) at an insurance broking organization     Highly ambition to learn grow     Commitment to build Plum for the long term

column2: Role & responsibilities     We   are seeking a experienced Deputy Manager to drive sales of IT Products specially Printers  through channel partners. Develop a sales plan for the assigned territory by   creating a channel blueprint- market reach, expansion, and consolidation.   Target setting for dealers for business, expansion, and promotion programs. Develop   & maintain strong relationship with existing channel partners, providing   them with necessary support, training, and resources. Collaborate with   partners to develop joint marketing and sales strategies to drive sales. Ensuring   an adequate number of channel partners to increase the market reach by   appointing a requisite number of partners, SI. Market visits with channel   partners to the customers regularly to get information on the market,   understand sales progress, issues in the market, and timely action. Allotment   target to channel partners and reviewing performance regularly. Working with   regional marketing to devise programs that will help them achieve targets.   Facilitating resolution of issues related to distribution viz marketing   support, clearance of backend, pricing, and logistics-related issues. column2: Candidates are needed to contact customers worldwide, pitch products, understand markets, identify opportunities and close deals. Deals are B2B and customers can be from wide range of industries, from Pharma, F&B, Ingredients, Cosmetic manufacturers, Wellness, importers and retailers. B2C sales for nutraceutical products.  Role & responsibilities   1. Relationship building with Customers 2. Selling and Marketing existing products and bringing in enquiries for new products.  3. Product Promotion.  4. Customer Service and Feedback 5. Travel and meet customers in India and International Destinations   General Responsibilities: Client Acquisition : Identify and target potential clients to expand the customer base. This includes researching industries and companies that could benefit from the company's products. Sales Strategy Development : Develop and implement effective sales strategies tailored to target markets to maximize revenue and profitability. Relationship Management : Build and maintain strong, long-lasting customer relationships. Act as the primary point of contact and manage all aspects of the business relationship. Negotiation : Negotiate contracts and close agreements to maximize profits while ensuring the clients needs are met. Market Analysis : Conduct market research to stay informed about industry trends, market conditions, and competitive activities. Sales Goals : Achieve and exceed annual sales targets within assigned territories and accounts. Specific Duties: Sales Presentations and Proposals : Prepare and deliver presentations and proposals that effectively communicate the value proposition of the products to prospective clients. Product Demonstration : Demonstrate products and services to potential clients, highlighting their benefits and how they meet the clients needs. Customer Support : Provide ongoing support to customers, addressing their needs and resolving any sales or product issues to maintain a high level of customer satisfaction. Reporting : Generate regular reports for management detailing sales activity, revenue generation, and client acquisition progress. Collaboration : Work closely with the marketing department to identify marketing materials and campaigns that support sales goals. Feedback Loop : Relay customer feedback to the product development and operations teams to help refine products and services. Strategic Responsibilities: Pricing Strategies : Assist in the development of pricing strategies, considering market conditions and company objectives to ensure competitive pricing. Training and Development : Stay up-to-date with product training and adapt to new sales strategies and techniques. Team Collaboration : Coordinate with other sales executives and team members to align strategies, exchange information, and assist each other in meeting overall business goals. Lead Management : Manage and nurture leads from initial contact through to sales completion, ensuring a smooth sales pipeline. Account Management : Manage a portfolio of accounts, develop new business from existing clients, and actively seek new sales opportunities. Continuous Improvement: Skill Enhancement : Continuously improve through feedback, coaching, and training opportunities. Innovation Contribution : Suggest and sometimes lead initiatives for new sales tactics or improvements in processes and products based on customer interactions and outcomes. Preferred candidate profile   BBA/ BBM/ BCom/ MCom/MBA with marketing specialisation, or International Business specialisation. Candidate needs to have affinity to sales and marketing. B2B sales being the profile, needs to be able to build and maintain relationships. Needs to have phone conversations all through the day.  Perks and benefits   Incentives on Purchases and Sales and Deals made.

column2: Department : Freight Forwarding Reports to : General Manager Location : Belapur  Job Description: As a Sales Manager in the field of Freight Forwarding, you will be responsible for driving sales initiatives, fostering client relationships, and achieving revenue targets within the logistics and supply chain industry.  Your primary focus will be on promoting our freight forwarding services, ensuring customer satisfaction, and expanding our market presence. Key Responsibilities: 1. Sales Strategy and Planning: Develop and implement effective sales strategies to achieve and exceed revenue targets. Conduct market research to identify new business opportunities and stay informed about industry trends. 2. Client Acquisition and Retention: Prospect and acquire new clients through targeted outreach, networking, and relationship-building. Nurture and maintain strong relationships with existing clients to ensure repeat business and client satisfaction. 3. Product Knowledge: Demonstrate in-depth knowledge of freight forwarding services, understanding customer needs, and positioning our offerings effectively. Keep abreast of industry advancements and competitor activities to maintain a competitive edge. 4. Sales Presentations and Proposals: Prepare and deliver compelling sales presentations and proposals to potential clients. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to customize solutions that meet clients' specific logistics requirements. 5. Contract Negotiation: Negotiate terms and conditions with clients, ensuring mutually beneficial agreements that align with company goals. 6. Performance Monitoring: Track and analyze sales performance metrics to identify areas for improvement and optimize sales processes. Prepare regular reports for management, providing insights into sales trends, forecasts, and opportunities. 7. Team Collaboration: Collaborate with internal teams, including operations and customer service, to ensure seamless service delivery and customer satisfaction. Provide training and support to the sales team, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement. 8. Compliance and Documentation: Ensure compliance with industry regulations and company policies. Maintain accurate and up-to-date documentation related to sales activities. 9. Targets and Quotas: Meet or exceed monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets and quotas set by the company. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in logistics, supply chain management, or a related field (Master's degree preferred). Proven experience in freight forwarding sales with a successful track record. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. Experience: Proven 7+ yrs experience in Sales in the freight forwarding sector

column2: Job Description Sr. Account Manager  Enterprise Sales India Region   About ANTAL  Antal International is a 30-year-old global executive Search and Placement firm with a network of over 800 people across 35+ countries originally based out of the UK. We at the Delhi office specialize in the fields of IT, ITES with focus on SAP resources. We work with various SAP Partner companies and help them find exceptional talents who can add value to the organization.    About Client: Our client delivers wide array of services such as Bespoke Software Development, IT Staff Augmentation, Database Management, Business Process Outsourcing and System Integration. They deal into BFSI, retail and sports verticals. They also have technology practices for other verticals such as Manufacturing, Pharmaceutical, Shipping and Logistics.   Headquartered in Navi Mumbai (Sanpada). Headcount is approximately  300+.   They have strong knowledge, expertise and working experience in application development and technology solutions using latest technologies, frameworks and platforms such as Microsoft's .Net, Microsoft SQL, Azure, Cross Platform Mobile Application, Java technology, and others.   Send CV to pranjal.yadav@antal.com   DesignationSenior Account Manager  Enterprise Sales ??India RegionLocationNavi Mumbai, SanpadaEducational QualificationBE, B.Tech with a Post-Graduation in Business, Marketing or a related field is preferredExperience10+ years     Roles and responsibilities:     Account Management : Acquire, Oversee, Manage and Nurture key accounts within the Large Enterprise / Diversified Groups / GCC sector in India. Relationship Building:  Cultivate and strengthen relationships with new and existing clients, understand their evolving needs and align solution, products and services to meet those requirements. Sales Strategy Development:  Develop and execute GTM and strategic sales plans tailored to the identified Large Enterprise accounts, aligning with organisation overall objectives for business growth, account acquisition, account growth and market penetration. Revenue Generation:  Drive revenue growth by identifying upsell and cross-sell opportunities, ensuring collaborative working with the delivery team for successful implementation of software services and collaborative working with the Solutions team to open new opportunities for exceeding sales targets. Market Analysis:  Stay abreast of industry trends, competitor activities, and market demands, providing valuable insights to the leadership team for informed decision-making.  Collaboration:  Work closely with cross-functional teams, including product development, marketing, and customer support, to ensure customer satisfaction and creation of customer testimonials / case studies. Representation:  Articulate participation and represent client at leading industry events.   Desired candidate?? profile: Proven track record of 10+ years in sales, specifically managing Large Enterprise accounts in India. Added Advantage: Demonstrated success in managing relationships with Large Enterprises / Diversified Groups / GCCs etc. Strong understanding of IT Software Services, Solution and Products and the Digital Transformation landscape. Exceptional relationship building, leadership, communication and negotiation skills. Ability to think strategically, out-of-the-box and challenge the status-quo  Results-driven with a focus on exceeding sales targets. In-depth knowledge of the Industry and Digital Transformation trends.

column2: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Sustainability and Circularity  Enterprise Sales Manager  to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR), circularity frameworks, and other sustainability services. This role involves hunting new clients, building strong relationships, achieving revenue targets, and actively promoting Recykal's sustainability and circularity solutions. Key Roles and Responsibilities: Client Acquisition / Hunting Role - Get new Accounts onboarded. Lead Generation through various channels.Responsible for using linkedIn, cold calling, and generating relevant referrals. Actively approach targeted business clients (telephone, email, social networks, events, etc.) and conduct efficient F2F meetings. Develop various sales strategies focused on targeting the right prospect and build effective go-to-market strategy for successful acquisition. Build and promote strong, long-lasting customer relationships by partnering with them and understanding their needs. Support clients in reaching sustainability and circularity objectives using Recykal's EPR loop technology framework and tools. Achieve set order booking/revenue targets for the vertical in the assigned territory. 3-Physical Visits are mandatory per day. Maintain accurate records of clientele information on the CRM. Demonstrate direct experience in business development, understanding government compliances, technicalities of rules and regulations and business operations. Possess a strong understanding of EPR and other sustainability services offered by Recykal. Identifying the correct decision makers in the companies and setting up the meeting to understand their requirements and how our products can help them. Achieve targets for allocated accounts and take ownership of order generation. Negotiating with the required stakeholders (Sustainability Heads, EHS/ESG Heads, Purchase/Procurement Heads, CFOs, etc.) and closing the deal. Cross-sell and upsell sustainability and circularity solutions to enterprise clients, group companies, and increase overall revenue. Effectively manage time, collaborate as a team player, and build relationships as the first point of contact for expert advice. Communicate effectively through written and oral presentations at all levels Role Requirements: Experience in business development and sales with an innate hunter mentality who has a proven track record of over-achieving sales revenue growth targets. Experience with CRM Tools (Zoho, Leadsquared, Salesforce, etc.) Masters degree (or MBA) from reputed institutions with a focus on sustainability, environment, waste management, packaging, recycling, etc. Experience in working with technology platforms is advantageous. Multi-sectoral experience in project management and handling clients for large corporations. Sound knowledge of Plastic waste management rules, e-waste management rules, CPCB notifications, MoEFCC guidelines, online platform for credit transfer, CPCB EPR portal. Experience managing clients with billing of at least Rs 25-30 lakhs per annum. Open to regular travel to client locations for face-to-face meetings.

column2: Creating a healthy pipeline and driving revenue through high dollar value enterprise sales for product within India and/or other specified regions.      Nurturing and building relationships with CXO s in Digital native businesses.      Having complete ownership of sales cycle from lead generation to closure.      Ensuring 100% customer satisfaction and maximizing retention as well as cross sell/up sell opportunities.      Meeting and exceeding all quarterly and annual sales targets.      Maintaining and developing sales forecasting and pipeline trackers to smoothen internal collaboration.          Onnivation is looking for an individual who is:          A hustler and self-starter who thrives in taking and executing new initiatives.      Able to work independently & effectively collaborate as part of a team in a fast-paced, rapidly changing environment.      Someone who can quickly build rapport with potential customers with a smile on their face we are client-facing on an everyday basis.      Exceptional storyteller; great at holding people s attention.      Constantly focused on building problem-solving skills with close attention to detail.                  Hungry, self-starter, independent, intelligent, opinionated, hardworking, etc.      Insanely curious, reads and asks a lot of questions, has a great attention to detail and looking for something to prove.          What s in it for you .          Exposure to the Deep tech ecosystem in Israel and India. We work with the most innovative companies in the world in the B2B Space.      Networking and pitching these innovations to key decision-makers(VCs, PE s, CEO s, Founders and CTO s) in the digital industry that is transforming India.      Cross-Cultural experience of working with Israel and India. Learn Negotiating skills from the best (Jewish community) in the world Yes, travel will be on the cards.          An environment focused on training we want our team members to be smarter and better than us.                  Access to a wellness and performance coach. We are big believers of mental well-being.      You ll learn more in one week than you have in the past three months on the job so sit back, don t relax and be ready to explore some mind-boggling tech solutions that may help in changing the way things are around you.              These are some of the common questions we tend to ask during an interview:        Thorough understanding of Onnivation s business.        What do you like about our business model?      How does it align with your vision?          Is a natural networker and loves attending events.          Share a scenario where you struggled to get to a person and how you cracked it eventually.      Share a few tips on Networking and Influencing people.      How do you learn and improve yourself in this skillset?          Excellent storytelling skills.          Do you think that physical appearance can affect decision when communicating with another person? Your thoughts.      Do you enjoy preparing for a presentation? Any tips you would like to share?          How would your colleagues describe you?      Are you comfortable making cold calls?        Account Management Client Relationships.        Which are the relationships that you are proud of?      Who is your favorite movie character/superhero/someone you admire? Why?      Tell me about the biggest challenges that come when you work with others?      Tell us a scenario where you went out of your way to help someone in need.          Research the company and the portfolio companies involved.      Research about the Israeli deep tech scene.      Research about Onnivation, we have been written about at several forums.      We take the above-mentioned attributes very seriously as part of our culture. A thorough prepared candidate stands the best chance of selection.

column2: Job Title: SALESB31001-Assistant Manager (Enterprise Sales)-Sales- India      Job Title: Asst Manager - Enterprise Sales     Broad outline of the Role     Drive sales of new and existing accounts by adding new revenue streams, acquiring new logos or through deep product penetration for the existing set of accounts. This implies complete ownership for driving new order booking (OB) and existing revenue, for the business or the assigned set of accounts. The role is responsible to drive achievement of sales targets (OB and revenue) through sales planning, prospecting, relationship building, opportunity identification, qualification, deal pursuit and closures. This is a tactical role which contributes in defining the direction of the operating plans based on the business strategy, with a significant mid-term impact on business unit overall results. MBA or equivalent preferred. 7-12 years of enterprise sales experience. Should have worked with technology services companies (telecom, hardware, software, applications, cloud services) in account management role. Expertise in drafting a Go to market plan/ customer acquisition strategy. Building key stakeholder relationships, multi-function and multi-level connects with decision makers, influencers, and executive sponsors within the accounts/partner organization. Building account ownership through understanding of customers strategic objectives, business requirements, operational challenges, buying decisions, contractual process, internal dynamics and manage key stakeholder expectations. column1: Tracxn - SAVP - Business Development - SaaS Sales - US (10 - 14 yrs)
column2: About Tracxn: Tracxn is a Bangalore based product company providing a research and deal sourcing platform for Venture Capital, Private Equity, Corp Devs & professionals working around the startup ecosystem. We are a team of 750+ working professionals serving customers across the globe. Our clients include Funds like Andreessen Horowitz, Sequoia Capital, Accel Partners, NEA; and Large Corporates such as ING, Societe Generale, LG and Royal Bank of Canada. We are funded by SAIF Partners, Accel, Sequoia. Angel investors like Ratan Tata, Nandan Nilekani, Sachin Bansal and Binny Bansal have also invested in Tracxn. Position: We are looking for a seasoned sales professional with a proven track record to join us as  Senior AVP - Business Development  for US Market This role is a senior management role. You will be responsible for building & managing a high performing sales team which will directly report to you. This is a  front end sales role . You will be directly responsible for driving  end-to-end sales of our SaaS product from prospecting to closure . You will be expected to sell to a diverse set of clients like Venture Capital funds, Fortune 1000 Corporates, Investment Banks, Accelerators, Incubators etc. The position is based out of Bangalore, where you will work closely with your team and reach out to prospects remotely, over calls, emails and video conferences. Please note the role does not involve traveling to clients location.  The timings for this position are 6:00 PM to 3:00 AM for the US market.  Key Responsibilities: Develop a 360 understanding of Tracxns product ,customer categories and competitors Develop a thorough understanding of Tracxns products and offerings Understand the different categories of customers we cater to. Understand how companies in these categories are driving innovation, investment decisions.  Understand how Tracxn creates value for these companies. Understand how they use Tracxn?? platform and keep identifying newer use cases Monitor competitors??activity globally. Stay updated about price points, new products/offerings launched Stay updated on market developments that may have a direct impact on the business Initiatives by existing and/or target customers. For ex. A corporate client whose Corp Dev team is working with us launches a startup incubator New initiatives that may impact the market as a whole. For ex. a large corporate in a traditional industry sets up an external innovation team. This may lead to other corporates in this industry setting up similar teams Regulatory changes which may lead to innovation Understand and implement the Sales Playbook  Thoroughly understand and implement the Sales Playbook - A sales guide created by the Central Business Team. This includes whom to reach out to, the sales pitch, and the mailers among other things. Notify the Central Business Team if anything is missing/not working out and needs to be updated. Sales playbook includes following:  Allocate accounts to your team members Prioritise customers on the basis of relevance of their use case, sales conversion ratios, potential market size , engagement with Tracxn?? marketing initiatives etc Re-allocate accounts to the team members maximizing the chances of conversion by leveraging individual traits like subject matter expertise, exposure to the geo, and past track record of your team Ensure inbound leads are serviced in a timely fashion Ensure all leads are reached out in a timely fashion. Plan for contingencies such as Lead owner on leave, more leads assigned to a person than he can handle, multiple owners of a lead etc  Ensure the team is using Sales Playbook to reach out to leads in most optimal way. Train and assist the team to customize the sales pitch according to the prospects and the situation Ensure healthy sales pipeline through outbound  Train and help the team members in generating demos via outbound - sending cold emails to the relevant contacts in the accounts assigned to them. Ensure the Sales Playbook is used by the team Ensure regular activity in all the accounts assigned. Re-allocate accounts with no activity from salesperson, new joinees, salesperson leaving the team etc.  Take responsibility of closures for your territory Completely own a territory and take responsibility of closures  You will be individually assigned accounts as well which you will be required to close You will be responsible for the closures of your team as well and ensure that sales closures are happening at their end as well Supervise and proactively assist team members where your intervention may be required to close the sale. Brainstorm and customize the sales pitch according to the prospect Train and help the team members in preparing for the demos. Review the pre-demos notes filled by the sales team and suggest improvements Train and help the team members on how to push for closure once demo is done Manage Sales Operations - Conduct 1-on-1s with your team on a daily basis.  Solve closure related customer queries. For ex: Missing use case, Pricing issues etc. Help team members in closure if needed  Review the work done by the team, including new reach-outs done, follow ups made, demos given, sales pipeline created. Provide pointed feedback and improvement areas on the approach, quality and throughput of the work done. Take feedback from top management on decisions taken.  Build and Manage your team Actively involved in hiring and building the team Identify training needs of your team members to reach their peak potential. Employ different training and mentoring methods for different team members, as needed Responsible for performance management within the team including appraisals, monthly ratings, discipline, etc Track conversion funnel and provide strategic input Closely monitor the conversion funnel of your team - sales pipeline, leads reached out to, demos set up, post demo follow ups, and closures Regular updates for the Leadership Team and the Board on key sales metrics including new customers, renewals, churns, and growth rate etc. Identify the bottlenecks and update management Analyze issues raised by customers. Provide feedback to Product, Business and Customer Success teams to improve the customer life cycle and experience Improve the Sales Playbook Work with the Central Business Team and pick projects to help improve the Sales Playbook. You can work on mailers (reach-out, follow-ups), collaterals, pitch across customer categories  Evolve Sales Playbook after understanding latest global practices, feedback from the BD team, interaction with the customers, past experience etc.  Here is what we are looking for:  10+ years of strong work experience in Enterprise/Institutional Sales/Account Management (experience in cross-border Remote Sales / Inside Sales / Concept selling is a plus) B2B SaaS Sales experience is mandatory At least 3 years in sales closures Prior team handling experience is preferred Flexible, organized and able to handle competing priorities Ready to relocate to Bangalore (5 Days Work from Office) What can you expect at Tracxn? Meritocracy Driven, Candid Culture. No Politics.  Like Minded Intellectually Curious Colleagues. High Paced Learning. Continuous Mentorship to help Achieve Peak Potential Learn to Manage Multi-Tier Reporting Founders Neha Singh (ex-Sequoia, BCG | MBA - Stanford GSB) Abhishek Goyal (ex-Accel Partners, Amazon | BTech - IIT Kanpur)

column1: Corporate Sales Manager - Pune ,  Chennai &  Bangalore
column2: The Corporate Sales Manager plays a crucial role in generating leads for a Business Line and managing the development of the lead to a stage where the win probability is high. The primary role of the Corporate Sales Manager is to prospect for new clients by networking, cold calling, advertising or other means of generating interest from potential clients. They must then plan persuasive approaches and pitches that will convince potential clients to do business with the company. They must develop a rapport with new clients, and provide support that will continually improve the relationship. They are also required to grow and retain existing accounts by presenting new solutions and services to clients. Strategic planning is a key part of this job description, since it is going to develop the pipeline of new business coming in to the company. This requires a thorough knowledge of the market, the solutions/services the company can provide, and of the company's competitors. The main duties of the Corporate Sales Manager can be summarized as follows: New Business Development Prospect for potential new clients and turn this into increased business. Cold call as appropriate within your market/geographic area to ensure a robust pipeline of opportunities. Meeting potential clients by growing, maintaining, and leveraging your network. Identify potential clients, and the decision makers within the client organization. Research and build relationships with new clients. Set up meetings between client decision makers and company's business heads. Plan approaches and pitches. Work with team to develop proposals that speaks to the clients needs, concerns, and objectives. Participate in pricing the solution/service. Present an image that mirrors that of the client. Client Retention Present new products and services and enhance existing relationships. Work with technical staff and other internal colleagues to meet customer needs. Business Development Planning Attend industry functions, such as association events and conferences, and provide feedback and information on market and creative trends. Present to and consult with mid and senior level management on business trends with a view to developing new services, products, and distribution channels. Identify opportunities for campaigns, services, and distribution channels that will lead to an increase in sales. Using knowledge of the market and competitors, identify and develop the company's unique selling propositions and differentiators. Management and Research Submit weekly progress reports and ensure data is accurately entered and managed within the company's CRM or other sales management system. Track and record activity on accounts and help to close deals to meet sales targets. Work with marketing staff to ensure that marketing activities are completed within a timely manner. Ensure all team members represent the company in the best light. Research and develop a thorough understanding of the company's people and capabilities. Understand the company's goal and purpose so that will continual to enhance the company's performance. OTHER RESPONSIBILITIES Promoting all business lines of the company  including Landlord Representation, Investor Services, etc.  in the market Work Relationship & Reporting Reporting Manager :BL Head Other Relationships: Transaction Managers for prospect handover (as assigned by BL Head) Educational Background Tertiary qualification in sales preferred; however, focus will be on experience & skills mainly Real Estate related qualification will be an advantage Key Skills, Experience and Background Experience of 2-6 years in sales and business development Specific real estate BD experience a strong plus Result-oriented with the aspiration &ambition to learn and excel Proficiency in the use of MS Office suite Excellent written and oral communication skills Well groomed and business like appearance at all times Exemplary ability to communicate clearly, logically and concisely Proactive desire to take on additional responsibility

Expand, sustain, and leverage your professional network to connect with potential clients. Identify key decision-makers within client organizations and establish rapport. column2: A Cloud Sales Specialist is responsible for driving sales and revenue growth by promoting cloud computing solutions to businesses.  This role involves understanding customer needs, offering tailored cloud solutions, and building strong relationships with clients.  Below is a detailed job description for a Cloud Sales Specialist: Job Overview: The Cloud Sales Specialist will be responsible for identifying and closing new business opportunities, managing client relationships, and collaborating with internal teams to deliver comprehensive cloud solutions.  The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of cloud technologies i.e. Oracle, Azure. Excellent communication skills, and a proven track record in sales. Key Responsibilities: Sales and Business Development: >> Identify and target potential clients for cloud computing solutions. >> Develop and execute sales strategies to meet or exceed revenue targets. >> Present and demonstrate cloud products and services to prospective clients. >> Manage the entire sales cycle from prospecting to closing deals. Client Relationship Management: >> Build and maintain strong relationships with new and existing clients. >> Understand client needs and provide tailored cloud solutions to meet those needs. >> Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction through excellent service and support. Collaboration and Coordination: >> Work closely with technical teams to ensure successful implementation and integration of cloud solutions. >> Collaborate with marketing teams to develop and execute promotional campaigns. >> Provide feedback to product development teams based on client needs and market trends. Market Analysis and Reporting: >> Stay up-to-date with industry trends and competitive landscape. >> Conduct market research to identify new opportunities and threats. >> Prepare regular sales reports and forecasts for management. Required Skills and Qualifications: Experience: >> Proven experience in a sales role, preferably in the Oracle & Azure technology. >> Demonstrated ability to achieve sales targets and drive revenue growth. Technical Skills: >> Strong understanding of cloud computing technologies and solutions (e.g., Azure, Oracle Cloud). >> Ability to explain complex technical concepts in simple terms. Soft Skills: >> Excellent communication and presentation skills. >> Strong negotiation and closing skills. >> Ability to build and maintain relationships with clients at all levels. >> Self-motivated with a results-driven approach. Preferred: >> Understanding of various industry verticals and their specific cloud needs. >> Familiarity with cybersecurity and data protection regulations related to cloud services.

You are the ideal candidate if you are an experienced and passionate security expert with a robust technical foundation and a flair for selling, advising, and evangelizing.          You are charismatic and influential, and you collaborate well across stakeholders and work with a sense of mission to surpass quotas and grow market share. column2: About Tracxn Tracxn is a Bangalore based product company providing a research and deal sourcing platform for Venture Capital, Private Equity, Corp Devs & professionals working around the startup ecosystem. Our clients include Funds like Andreessen Horowitz, Sequoia Capital, Accel Partners, NEA; and Large Corporates such as ING, Societe Generale, LG and Royal Bank of Canada. We are funded by SAIF Partners, Accel, Sequoia. Angel investors like Ratan Tata, Nandan Nilekani, Sachin Bansal and Binny Bansal have also invested in Tracxn. Position We are looking for a seasoned sales professional with a proven track record to step into the role of  Senior AVP - Business Development  to join our Industry Events Sales team. This is a  front end sales role . You will be directly responsible for identifying and representing Tracxn in the relevant Industry events. You will be expected to sell to a diverse set of clients like Venture Capital funds, Fortune 1000 Corporates, Investment Banks, Accelerators, Incubators etc. This role is suitable for someone adept at building and maintaining business relationships, negotiating deals, and leading a team towards our vision. column2: The    Channel Alliances Leader - Google EMEA    is responsible for the performance and field alignment of Cyderes strategic partnership with Google in EMEA.
